definition: to esteem/to revere/to think highly of sb
to esteem/to think highly of/to accord importance to/to revere
person with remarkable academic or artistic attainments/master craftsman/highly esteemed person
to propose/to put forward (an idea)/to initiate

Yuan Jue (1267-1327), Yuan dynasty writer and calligrapher
